title: Water fountains
summaries: Water fountains are mechanisms that change the color of all nearby water. They can be activated via ⚷ Open / Activate or wire. There are currently 10 / 8 different obtainable fountains, all of which are purchased from the Witch Doctor for 4 each at any time. On the [img:Old-gen console version] Old-gen console version and Nintendo 3DS[img:Nintendo 3DS version] versions, they are able to be purchased for free, but are only available after Plantera has been defeated. The range of a Fountain is (when measured from the edges of the sprite) 60 tiles left, 53 tiles up, 60 tiles right, and 53 tiles down
